Lines.Description: If block_x == math_x2 AND block_y == math_y2 ELSE GOTO 00000508
Print 'Runtime Error: no loaded talkpad' on quit

If actor_spawnerid == newvalue AND actor_uniqueid != newvalue ELSE GOTO 00001134

If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001626
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001702

If camera_x > Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001944
If camera_y < Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00002014
If camera_y > Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00002084
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left

If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00002348

If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00002484
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_up
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00002646
Print 'Error: Level needs to be at least as tall as the current Y Resolution value {yres}' on quit
If teleport is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003198
If audiodriver == audiodriver_ptplayer OR audiodriver == audiodriver_mdsdrv ELSE GOTO 00003394
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003750

If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004036

If true is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004174
If Test bit neogeo_start on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00004168
If music is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004456
Print 'Too much RAM used ({chipram} bytes). Consider reducing max active actors or largest map size.' on quit
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005154
Print 'Cannot change yres while level loaded' on quit
If yres & 0xf is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005272
Print 'Y resolution must be multiples of 16 on Neo Geo' on quit
If actor_x >= camera_x + XRes ELSE GOTO 00005376
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres ELSE GOTO 00005442
If panel is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005714
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005714

If panel_top is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005806

If actor_x >= camera_x + xres + 16 ELSE GOTO 00006544
If actor_y > yres + camera_y ELSE GOTO 00006670
Yield on  timer to  next line
Print 'Test complete. Score - {score}' to bottom panel
